title: FS/FT: Large Lot of T207's with Several Tough Ones
author: marcdelpercio

posts.post_title: FS/FT: Large Lot of T207's with Several Tough Ones
posts.post_content:
I have the following T207's available.  Several tough cards here.  Just added sale prices but I'd love to trade as well.  I collect just about everything pre-war, especially E90-1, E91, E92, E93, E94, E95, E96, E97, E98, E101, E102, T204, T210, 1933-1936 Goudey and really just about anything else so don't hesitate to send me ANY offers.  

Would trade in your favor for any of the final 10 T207's that I need (Birmingham, Blackburne, Donlin, Donnelly, Engle, Fisher (white cap), Kuhn, Lowdermilk, McCarthy, Wheat).

All sale prices are delivered.  Payment via Paypal, cash, check, or money order all fine.

Cards available are as follows (scans are below):

-raw cards-

***ALL RAW CARDS HAVE BEEN SOLD OR TRADED.  SOME GRADED ONES STILL AVAILABLE. THANKS!!***

Bump for sale prices added...still would love to trade also.  Thanks for looking!
